20  geometry_msgs::Vector3 operator/(geometry_msgs::Vector3 one,T other)
21  {

23  ret.x=one.x/other;

84  //JointState
85  sensor_msgs::JointState operator+(sensor_msgs::JointState one,sensor_msgs::JointState other)
86  {
87  if(one.name.size()==0)
88  {
89  if(other.name.size()==0)
90  {
91  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Returning empty filtered states!");
92  return sensor_msgs::JointState();
93  }
94  else
95  {
96  return other;
97  }
98  }
99  if(other.name.size()==0)
100  {
101  return one;
102  }
103  for(int i=0;i<other.name.size();i++)
104  {
105  one.position[i]=one.position[i]+other.position[i];
106  one.velocity[i]=one.velocity[i]+other.velocity[i];
107  one.effort[i]=one.effort[i]+other.effort[i];
108  }
109  return one;
110  }
111 
112  template <typename T>
113  sensor_msgs::JointState operator/(sensor_msgs::JointState one,T other)
114  {
115  if(one.name.size()==0)
116  {
117  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Returning empty sensor msg!");
118  return one;
119  }
120 
121  for(int i=0;i<one.name.size();i++)
122  {
123  one.position[i]=one.position[i]/other;
124  one.velocity[i]=one.velocity[i]/other;
125  one.effort[i]=one.effort[i]/other;
126  }
127 
128  return one;
129  }
130 }
